flawed_nl_solution:
Brady will make $450 + $1500 = $<<450+1500=1970>>1970.
Combined, Brady and Dwayne will make $1970 + $1500 = $<<1970+1500=3470>>3470 in a year.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1950, not 1970. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
